name: Daidais
body:
## Wordpress

* [Morepress](http://daidais.github.io/morepress/): Stuff made easily on Wordpress.

## FuelPHP

* [FuelSanitize package](https://github.com/daidais/fuelsanitize): A FuelPHP Package to help cleaning some data.
* [FuelElasticsearch package](http://daidais.github.io/fuelelasticsearch): A FuelPHP package to interact with Elasticsearch.
* [FuelGoogleAgenda package](https://github.com/daidais/fuelgoogleagenda): A FuelPHP package to interact with Google Agenda.
* [FuelMailChimp package](http://daidais.github.io/fuelmailchimp): A FuelPHP package to interact with MailChimp.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
